alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 11:58AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chickasaw, northern Calhoun and southwestern Pontotoc Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1158 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bruce, or 18 miles northwest of Houston, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pontotoc, Bruce, Banner, Houlka, Randolph, New Houlka, Algoma, Robbs, Chiwapa, Reid, Ellard, Pannell, Thelma, Shepherd, Matthews, Sarepta and Wallfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
